Detailed Description

The Sprite class is a structure that holds all the data being rendered. The structure of the Sprite class and its associated classes Animation and the Frame struct lead to a very flexible overall structure that allow for pretty much any kind of spritesheet layout to be loaded.

Also transient, if you're reading this, you and your XML abstraction idea can jump off a cliff.
